data.name: AdminActionEditTeamSettings
data.value: edit team settings
data.comment: Action for edit team settings

data.name: AdminActionEditUser
data.value: edit user
data.comment: Admin action for editing user profile and opt in status

data.name: AdminActionGeneratePairs
data.value: generate pairs
data.comment: Admin action option for filling into the which teams

data.name: AdminActionNoTeamMsg
data.value: The {0} action is only for users who have admin privileges.
data.comment: Message for user who tries to invoke an admin action but are not admins

data.name: AdminActionNotifyNeedApproval
data.value: change notify mode to require admin approval
data.comment: Admin action option

data.name: AdminActionNotifyNoApproval
data.value: change notify mode to no approval
data.comment: Admin action option

data.name: AdminActionSendTeamWelcome
data.value: send the team welcome card

data.name: AdminActionWhichTeamText
data.value: Which team do you wish to {0} for?
data.comment: Title for card that asks which team the admin action should be generated for

data.name: ChatWithMatchButtonText
data.value: Chat with {0}
data.comment: Button text to initiate a chat with the person the user has been matched up with

data.name: ChatWithMeButtonText
data.value: Chat With Me
data.comment: Button text for chatting with the bot

data.name: EditEnrollmentButtonText
data.value: Edit Enrollment
data.comment: Edit enrollment of statuses in teams

data.name: EditProfileButtonText
data.value: Edit Profile
data.comment: Edit profile button text

data.name: EditProfileNoTeam
data.value: This is unexpected. I can't determine the team you want to edit your profile for.

data.name: EditTeamSettingsButtonText
data.value: Admin: Edit Team Settings
data.comment: Button text for edit team settings

data.name: EditTeamSettingsUnrecognizedUserName
data.value: Admin User: could not find the name {0} in the team. Please double check the spelling and make sure it is the full name.
data.comment: When the user name is entered for the admin but we can't find it.

data.name: EditUserButtonText
data.value: Admin: Edit Any User
data.comment: Admin action for editing user profile and opt in status of someone on the team they manage

data.name: ErrorOccured
data.value: There was an error while processing the request. Retry?
data.comment: A generic message that is sent when there is an error occurring

data.name: InstallMessageBotDescription
data.value: Do you eat lunch? Why not do it with a buddy? I can match you with someone new each month so you can meet new friends or just get to know your team better.
data.comment: Part 2 of the install message when the name of the installer is known

data.name: InstallMessageInstruction
data.value: **Join in and I will message you at the start of the month with your match.**
data.comment: Part 3 of the install message with the name of the installer known

data.name: InstallMessageInstructionAdmin
data.value: **Admin Instructions**
data.comment: Admin instructions title

data.name: InstallMessageKnownInstaller
data.value: If you're reading this, it's most likely because {0} added me to the **{1}** team.
data.comment: Install message and also the welcome message when the app installer is known - {0} is the placeholder for the name of the user that has installed the app to the team, and {1} is the placeholder for the name of the team that the app has been installed to

data.name: InstallMessageSuggestedNextStep
data.value: Edit your profile to ensure a good match. You can always pause matches at any time.
data.comment: Ask the user to edit their profile

data.name: InstallMessageSuggestedNextStepAdmin
data.value: 1. Edit the team settings to setup the subteam names.\r2. Send the welcome team card to the team. (New members added to the team will get a welcome message automatically).\r3. Join LunchBuddy and edit your profile to ensure a good match.\r4. Wait for a match at the beginning of the month or you can click {0} to create matches right away (you will have the ability to review them before deciding to send it).

data.name: InstallMessageUnknownInstaller
data.value: If you're reading this, it's because I was installed to **{0}** team.
data.comment: Install message and also the welcome message when the app installer is not known - {0} is the placeholder for the name of the team that the app has been installed to

data.name: JoinButtonText
data.value: Join LunchBuddy in {0}
data.comment: Button for joining into the program for a particular team

data.name: MakePairsButtonText
data.value: Admin: Create Pairs
data.comment: Button text for make pairs from opted in users

data.name: ManualNotifiedUsersErrorMessage
data.value: Could not notify the users. Please try again or regenerate new pairings.
data.comment: Error message if the pairs could not be notified manually

data.name: ManualNotifiedUsersMessage
data.value: Notified {0} out of {1} users.
data.comment: Message after the pairs have been notified manually

data.name: MatchUpCardContentPart1
data.value: Hi there again, I'm {0} in {1}. A bot that pairs you with a new coworker to meet each month.
data.comment: First part of the match up card main content

data.name: MatchUpCardContentPart2
data.value: Feel free to set something up :)
data.comment: Second part of the match up card main content

data.name: MatchUpCardMatchedText
data.value: You've been matched with **{0}**.
data.comment: The text saying who the user has been matched up with

data.name: MatchUpCardTitleContent
data.value: It's time for a match!
data.comment: The title text for the pairup notification adaptive card

data.name: MeetupContent
data.value: Hey there, looks like we've been matched by {0} this month. It would be great to meet up for a lunch or a chat if you've got time.
data.comment: Content of the Meetup for the propose meeting

data.name: MeetupTitle
data.value: {0} / {1} LunchBuddy
data.comment: The title for the Meetup - {0} is the name of the first person that user has been matched with and {1} is the name of the user

data.name: NewPairingsDescription
data.value:
You have received this message because you are the admin designated for approving new pairings for the team.
Send the pairings if it looks good, or you may create new pairings.
data.comment: Description for the new pairings text

data.name: NewPairingsNotEnoughUsers
data.value: There are not enough active users to make pairs. You need at least two but there are currently {0}.
data.comment: Message for when there are not enough users users to make pairs with

data.name: NewPairingsOddPerson
data.value: Odd Person
data.comment: Odd person in new pairings

data.name: NewPairingsTitle
data.value: New Pairings for {0}
data.comment: The title text for the new pairings card

data.name: NotifyModeFail
data.value: Sorry I had a problem updating the notify mode.
data.comment: The text to show when need approval setting failed

data.name: NotifyModeNeedApprovalSuccess
data.value: Matches will be sent to the admin for approval before the users are notified of their pairing.
data.comment: The text to show when need approval setting was successfully changed

data.name: NotifyModeNoApprovalSuccess
data.value: Matches will be sent to the pairs without asking for admin approval.
data.comment: The text to show when no approval setting was successfully changed

data.name: OptInConfirmation
data.value: Welcome {0}! When match time occurs, I will message you with your new buddy. (This only occurs for people in the team.)
data.comment: The confirmation reply that is sent when the user opts into matches

data.name: OptInOrOutNoTeam
data.value: This is unexpected. I can't determine the team you want to edit your status for.

data.name: OptInUserFailText
data.value: Sorry, I had trouble opting you back in. Retry?
data.comment: Show this text when the user opt in failed

data.name: OptOutConfirmation
data.value: I've paused your matches in {0}. You can turn them back on whenever you like.
data.comment: The confirmation reply that is sent when the user pauses matches for a particular team.

data.name: OptOutConfirmationAnotherUser
data.value: I've paused {0}'s matches in {1}. You can turn them back on whenever you like.
data.comment: When the admin is opting out for another user, show this message for opt out confirmation

data.name: OptOutUserFailText
data.value: Sorry, I had trouble opting you out. Retry?
data.comment: Show this text when the user opt out failed

data.name: PausePairingsButtonText
data.value: Pause Matches in {0}
data.comment: Button text to pause pairings for a particular team

data.name: ProposeMeetupButtonText
data.value: Propose Meetup
data.comment: Button text to propose the meetup with the match of the user

data.name: RegeneratePairingsButtonText
data.value: Create New Pairings
data.comment: Button text to regenerate pairings

data.name: ResumePairingsButtonText
data.value: Resume Matches in {0}
data.comment: Button text to resume pairings for a particular team

data.name: SalutationTitleText
data.value: Hi there!
data.comment: This is the text for the salutation in the adaptive cards when the bot is installed to a team and also when new users are added to the team

data.name: SaveProfileFailText
data.value: Sorry, I could not save the user profile. Retry?
data.comment: Show this text when the user profile could not be saved

data.name: SaveUserInfoFailText
data.value: Sorry, I could not save the user info. Retry?
data.comment: Show this text when the user info could not be saved

data.name: SendPairingsButtonText
data.value: Send Pairings
data.comment: Button text to send pairings

data.name: SendWelcomeCardFail
data.value: I had trouble sending the welcome card to {0}. Retry?
data.comment: Response to failure to send the welcome card to the team. The input is the team name.

data.name: SendWelcomeCardSuccess
data.value: Sent welcome card to {0}
data.comment: Response to successfully sending the welcome card to the team. The input is the team name.

data.name: TakeATourButtonText
data.value: Take a Tour
data.comment: The text for the button which launches a tour when clicked

data.name: UnknownUserName
data.value: unknown
data.comment: Name that appears when an AAD account is disabled. A check is made to filter out names that contain this string when evaluating opted in users for match ups

data.name: UnrecognizedInput
data.value: Hi! What would you like to do?
data.comment: The text for the unrecognized input scenario

data.name: UnrecognizedInputChooseTeam
data.value: Hi, which team do you want to perform actions for?
data.comment: Where there are multiple teams for unrecognized input, display this to pick the team

data.name: UnrecognizedInputInChannelText
data.value: Hi! Chat with me one on one so I can help you.
data.comment: Text to show when there's unrecognized message in a channel

data.name: UnrecognizedInputNoTeam
data.value: I'd love to help but LunchBuddy is not installed in any teams yet.
data.comment: The app is not installed on any team but we're talking to the app.

data.name: WelcomeTeamButtonText
data.value: Admin: Send Welcome Card
data.comment: Sends the welcome card and invite user to chat with the bot

data.name: WelcomeTeamSuggestedNextStep
data.value: Chat with me to join in. You can always pause matches at any time.
data.comment: Suggested next step in the welcome team card

data.name: WelcomeTourTitle
data.value: Tour
data.comment: This is the title of the tour for the Icebreaker Bot
